Issue.summary: Add a description at the top of the indy-sdk repository on github
Issue.description: There is no description for the indy-sdk repository at the top of the page. Something like "This is the official SDK for Hyperledger Indy|https://www.hyperledger.org/projects , which provides a distributed-ledger-based foundation for self-sovereign identity|https://sovrin.org/ . "
